trans-unit.source: Represents one or more cubic Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 表示一条或多条三次方贝塞尔曲线。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to store <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment> objects and other segments.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>要存储对象<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment>对象和其他段。

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bezier curve is defined by four points: a start point, an end point and two control points.
trans-unit.target: 由四个点定义三次方贝塞尔曲线： 起点、 终点和两个控制点。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment> specifies one or more cubic Bezier curves by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points%2A> property to a collection of points.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment>通过设置指定一个或多个三次方贝塞尔曲线<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points%2A>的点的集合的属性。

trans-unit.source: For every three points in the collection, the first and second points specify the two control points of the curve and the third point specifies the end point.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个集合中的三个点，第一个和第二个点指定的曲线的两个控点和第三个点指定的终结点。

trans-unit.source: Note that no start point for the curve is specified because start point is the same as the end point of the last segment.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，指定曲线没有开始点，因为起始点的最后一段的结束点相同。

trans-unit.source: The two control points of a cubic Bezier curve behave like magnets, attracting portions of what would otherwise be a straight line toward themselves and producing a curve.
trans-unit.target: 三次方贝塞尔曲线的两个控制点的行为类似于磁铁，吸引本部分的不然就是一条直线朝着自身的方向并生成一条曲线。

trans-unit.source: The first control point affects the beginning portion of the curve; the second control point affects the ending portion of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 第一个控制点影响曲线; 的开头部分第二个控制点影响曲线的结束部分。

trans-unit.source: Note that the curve doesn't necessarily pass through either of the control points; each control point moves its portion of the line toward itself, but not through itself.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，曲线不一定通过两个控制点;每个控点将移动行向本身，但无法通过本身其部分。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment> to draw two cubic Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment>绘制两个三次方贝塞尔曲线。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The collection of points that specify the geometry of the cubic Bezier curve segments.
trans-unit.target: 指定三次方贝塞尔曲线段几何图形的点的集合。

trans-unit.source: Value specifying whether the segments are stroked.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否绘制线段的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> class with the specified collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> objects and a value specifying whether the segments are stroked.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> 对象集合和一个指定是否为线段描边的值，来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 类的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> that define this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置定义此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PointCollection" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" />。

trans-unit.source: Collection that define this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 定义此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment> that defines two cubic Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment>定义两个三次方贝塞尔曲线。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.PolyBezierSegment.Points" /> 依赖项属性。
